CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is the contribution type reason code. The Roth IRA Contribution Type is Qualified Reservists/Designated Disaster Distribution Repayment or Disaster/Combat Zone Postponed Contribution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The contribution type reason code. The Roth IRA Contribution Type is Qualified Reservists/Designated Disaster Distribution Repayment or Disaster/Combat Zone Postponed Contribution.
CustomField.label: Roth Contribution Reason
